raw_body: DHARMAPALA – SENARATH – Loving husband of Irene,​ father of Devika and Dr Arinda (Prof. University of Peradeniya),​ son-in-law of Sunil Karunaratne (NDB) and Dr Sayuri (Teaching Hospital,​ Peradeniya),​ grandfather of Devina & Divyani. Cortege leaves residence,​ Dharmasoka Mawatha,​ Aruppola,​ Kandy at 3.00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ the 20th September 2023 for General Cemetery,​ Mahaiyawa (Anglican Section).059722
